title: Follow you follow me
brief_description: Examines the complexities in the friendship of two teenage boys - one a shy thirteen year old whose father owns a factory, and the other a confident extrovert whose father is an employee and shop steward at this same factory. An industrial dispute directly affects this friendship and the intensity of their feelings is revealed.
